list.name: Changes
list.comment: + added method "generateDrawPile". For the moment it doesn't work, because I have to find how to correctly pick a random card (because for the moment, there are not generated). + added method "pickDrawCard". This method should work, it prints a random card of the draw pile. We'll have to change the print by the thing that will interest us (for example, adding it in the deck).

task.summary: Add gitignore and start of the project
Adding all the classes that we should have for the project to work
+ add the setters and getters for value and isReturned
+ add the setter and getter for the score. + add method for initializeDeck. It needs to be updated by changing values when the class DrawPile will work. It doesn't work for the moment.
+ add the setters and getters for the class Player.
+ add the setters and getters for the class Player.
+ add a new method : returnCard. if the value of getIsReturned, it will return the card of the deck, so the player will be able to see the value of his card (only one).
+ only added the variable "nbPlayers" and the setter & getter for this variable

+ added method "generateDrawPile". For the moment it doesn't work, because I have to find how to correctly pick a random card (because for the moment, there are not generated). + added method "pickDrawCard". This method should work, it prints a random card of the draw pile. We'll have to change the print by the thing that will interest us (for example, adding it in the deck).

MESSAGE.value: Add gitignore and start of the project
Adding all the classes that we should have for the project to work
+ add the setters and getters for value and isReturned
+ add the setter and getter for the score. + add method for initializeDeck. It needs to be updated by changing values when the class DrawPile will work.
+ add the setter and getter for the score. + add method for initializeDeck. It needs to be updated by changing values when the class DrawPile will work. It doesn't work for the moment.
+ add the setters and getters for the class Player.
+ add a new method : returnCard. if the value of getIsReturned, it will return the card of the deck, so the player will be able to see the value of his card (only one).
+ only added the variable "nbPlayers" and the setter & getter for this variable

+ added method "generateDrawPile". For the moment it doesn't work, because I have to find how to correctly pick a random card (because for the moment, there are not generated). + added method "pickDrawCard". This method should work, it prints a random card of the draw pile. We'll have to change the print by the thing that will interest us (for example, adding it in the deck).

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: + added method "generateDrawPile". For the moment it doesn't work, because I have to find how to correctly pick a random card (because for the moment, there are not generated). + added method "pickDrawCard".
